title: Force direction on test charge at opposite corners

content.description: As shown above, two particles, each of charge +Q, are fixed at opposite corners of a square that lies in the plane of the page. A positive test charge +q is placed at a third corner.
content.question: What is the direction of the force on the test charge due to the two other charges?

choices.label: Choice A is an arrow pointing up and to the right.
Choice B is an arrow pointing to the right.
Choice C is an arrow pointing down and to the right.
Choice D is an arrow pointing down.
Choice E is an arrow pointing down and to the left.

content.answer: Choice E is an arrow pointing down and to the left.
